server.model

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.Student

  • public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
    Class created for each student to keep track of registrations
    Author:
    Joel Happ + Jerome Gobeil

      • getRegistrationByCourse

        public Registration getRegistrationByCourse(Course c)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Searches for a registration by course, returns the registration if found.
        Parameters:
        c - The course whose registration is being searched for.
        Returns:
        The registration matching the course, or null if there is none.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addCourseOffering

        public void addCourseOffering(CourseOffering co)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Registers a student in a course, if the student is able to.
        Parameters:
        co - Course Offering to register the student in.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the maximum number of registrations for this student has been reached or if student is already in course

      • checkEnrolled

        public int checkEnrolled(Course c)
        Checks if the student is enrolled in the passed course
        Parameters:
        c - the course to check for
        Returns:
        -1 if not enrolled, else it returns the section number of the student
